song_lyrics: Sāchā sant maḷe to ṭāḷe tāpne re,
Jāya sanshaya ne shoknu shūḷ re,
Maḷavu monghu muktanu re.
Kare pārya apār ā sansārthī re,
Jāya moh ne māyānu mūḷ re... Maḷavu.
Sant sarve āpe re guṇ āpaṇā re,
Kare angmāthī avidyāno nāsh re... Maḷavu.
Ānjī anjanne ughāḍe ānkhyane re,
Teṇe agnān tam pāme nās re... Maḷavu.
Āpe updesh oḷakhāve ātmā re,
Bhānge bhramaṇā bhrānti ne bhūlya re... Maḷavu.
Jaḍ chaitanya jaṇāve jo jujavā re,
Āpe ānand akhanḍ ange amūlya re... Maḷavu.
Brahmānand ānand ange ulaṭe re,
Maṭe kalapanā mannā vikār re... Maḷavu.
Pāme pūraṇ ānand vāme vyādhīne re,
Hoy Sahajānand sukh apār re... Maḷavu.
Rahe magan magan jan manmā re,
Tanatagan lagan laya lin re... Maḷavu.
Hete prīte chintave Harivarne re,
Rahe Harimāhi jem jal min re... Maḷavu.
Evā sant maḷyānu sukh shu kahu re,
Kalpataru kāmdhen na kahevāy re... Maḷavu.
Kahe Niṣhkuḷānand dhanya santne re,
Jenā Bhāgvat Gītā guṇ gāya re... Maḷavu.
title: Sāchā sant maḷe to ṭāḷe tāpne re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1086: Sadguru Nishkulanand Swami

Category: Sant Mahima Pad
